error.versionNoLongerSupported: Micronaut Launch no longer supports version {{requestedVersion}} we're setting the configuration to the most recent release version {{currentVersion}}

tooltips.diff: Show the changes that the selected features have on an application generated without any features selected
tooltips.features: Choose the features you would like included in the application
tooltips.generate: Download a zip file of the application
tooltips.createRepo: Create a repo on GitHub with this configuration.
tooltips.preview: Explore the application source files with the selected options and features to see what will be generated

share.header: Copy one of the following links to share this project
share.config: You can share the link to the configured application
share.diff: or view a diff from a baseline application
share.zip: You can also directly download a zip
